sentences.sCn: 她成了一名演主角的芭蕾舞女演员。

sentences.sContent: Under the skin a ballerina might have the heart of a boxer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Under the skin a ballerina might have the heart of a boxer.
sentences.sCn: 在皮肤之下，一个芭蕾舞演员可能有一颗拳击者的心。

sentences.sContent: As a ballerina, to embody the duality of the Swan Queen and the black swan can be a fiendishly difficult task.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a ballerina, to embody the duality of the Swan Queen and the black swan can be a fiendishly difficult task.
sentences.sCn: 作为一名芭蕾舞女演员，去体现天鹅女王和黑天鹅的两面性可能是一个残忍的困难的任务。

trans.tranCn: 芭蕾舞女演员，芭蕾舞女
trans.tranOther: a woman who dances in ballets
